com.samczsun.skype4j.chat

Interface Chat

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GroupChat, IndividualChat

    public interface Chat
    Represents a single chat. This can be a private message or a group chat.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alertsOff()
      Sets your alerts off.
      void alertsOn()
      Sets your alerts on.
      void alertsOn(String keyword)
      Sets your alerts on to a keyword.
      List<ChatMessage> getAllMessages()
      Return a view of all the messages saved, in chronological order
      Collection<User> getAllUsers()
      Return a view of all the users in this chat
      Skype getClient()
      Get the Skype instance associated with this chat
      String getIdentity()
      Get the identity of the chat.
      User getSelf()
      Get yourself!
      User getUser(String username)
      Get the User object represented by that username.
      boolean isLoaded()
      Returns whether this chat has finished loading Any calls to act upon the chat will throw a NotLoadedException if the chat is not loaded
      void sendContact(Contact contact)
      Sends a contact to this chat
      void sendFile(File file)
      Sends a file to this chat
      void sendImage(BufferedImage image, String imageType, String imageName)
      Sends an image to this chat
      void sendImage(File image)
      Sends an image to this chat
      ChatMessage sendMessage(Message message)
      Sends a formatted message to this chat.
      ChatMessage sendMessage(String plainMessage)
      Sends a plain message to this chat.
      void sendMoji(IMoji moji)
      Sends a Moji to this chat

    • Method Detail

      • sendMessage

        ChatMessage sendMessage(Message message)
                 throws ConnectionException
        Sends a formatted message to this chat.
        Parameters:
        message - The rich text to send
        Returns:
        The ChatMessage object representing the message
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        NotLoadedException - If the chat has not yet been loaded

      • sendMessage

        ChatMessage sendMessage(String plainMessage)
                 throws ConnectionException
        Sends a plain message to this chat.
        Parameters:
        plainMessage - The plain message to send
        Returns:
        The ChatMessage object representing the message
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        NotLoadedException - If the chat has not yet been loaded

      • sendContact

        void sendContact(Contact contact)
          throws ConnectionException
        Sends a contact to this chat
        Parameters:
        contact - The contact to send
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint

      • sendImage

        void sendImage(BufferedImage image,
               String imageType,
               String imageName)
        throws ConnectionException,
               IOException
        Sends an image to this chat
        Parameters:
        image - The image to send
        imageType - The type of image (jpg, png, etc)
        imageName - The name of the image
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        IOException - If an error occurs while reading the image file

      • sendImage

        void sendImage(File image)
        throws ConnectionException,
               IOException
        Sends an image to this chat
        Parameters:
        image - The file containing the image
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
        IOException - If an error occurs while reading the image file

      • sendFile

        void sendFile(File file)
       throws ConnectionException
        Sends a file to this chat
        Parameters:
        file - The file to send
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint

      • sendMoji

        void sendMoji(IMoji moji)
       throws ConnectionException
        Sends a Moji to this chat
        Parameters:
        moji - The appropriate lang-based Flik message
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint

      • getUser

        User getUser(String username)
        Get the User object represented by that username. Usernames are case insensitive
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the user
        Returns:
        The user object, or null if not found
        Throws:
        NotLoadedException - If the chat has not yet been loaded

      • getSelf

        User getSelf()
        Get yourself!
        Returns:
        Your user object!

      • getIdentity

        String getIdentity()
        Get the identity of the chat. Persistent across restarts
        Returns:
        The identity of this chat

      • getAllUsers

        Collection<User> getAllUsers()
        Return a view of all the users in this chat
        Returns:
        All the users

      • getAllMessages

        List<ChatMessage> getAllMessages()
        Return a view of all the messages saved, in chronological order
        Returns:
        All the messages saved

      • getClient

        Skype getClient()
        Get the Skype instance associated with this chat
        Returns:
        The Skype instance

      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded()
        Returns whether this chat has finished loading Any calls to act upon the chat will throw a NotLoadedException if the chat is not loaded
        Returns:
        Whether the chat is loaded

      • alertsOff

        void alertsOff()
        throws ConnectionException
        Sets your alerts off. Does not affect anything in this API
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint

      • alertsOn

        void alertsOn()
       throws ConnectionException
        Sets your alerts on. Does not affect anything in this API
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint

      • alertsOn

        void alertsOn(String keyword)
       throws ConnectionException
        Sets your alerts on to a keyword. Does not affect anything in this API
        Parameters:
        keyword - The word to alert to
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - If an error occurs while connecting to the endpoint
